com.syntax.manage

Class SyntaxManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.syntax.manage.SyntaxManager

  • public class SyntaxManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Hold color and attribute of package. Any characteristic can be gotten from getting function in this class are not allowed dynamically to be changed. * Public static field in this class are the default value of SyntaxManager

      • getColor

        public static java.awt.Color getColor(java.lang.String colorStr)
        Parse hex color string ex1. alpha parameter are significant byte getColor("#80007EE6") = new Color(0, 126, 230, 128) ex2. no alpha parameter getColor("#007EE6") = new Color(0, 126, 230)
        Parameters:
        colorStr - must have leading #
        Returns:
        parsed color
        See Also:
        Color
